TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it get destroyed before it's used or researched.

I wish I could make good SSTOs in KSP.

Granted. But they can work only on Gilly.

I wish Gilly had air.

Granted, but there's not enough to do anything.

I wish that KER was in the stock version of KSP.

Granted, but since everyone wants a modded version of KSP instead of stock, it is quickly removed so it can be a mod again.

I wish to be on the development team for KSP2.

27 minutes ago, Popestar said:

Granted, but since everyone wants a modded version of KSP instead of stock, it is quickly removed so it can be a mod again.

I wish to be on the development team for KSP2.

KSP2 gets cancelled and you have no job.

I wish I could build planes that don't tip over while steering on the ground.

Granted, but they tip over if you dont steer.

I wish that I could have a perfect clone do work for me so I can relax all the time.

Granted. Now you're working 24/7 for him because everyone believed him that he is you.

I wish KSP-2 was a mod for KSP-1.

Granted, but it has 100000000000000000000000000000000x the glitches of stock.

I wish for good free lunch forever.

Granted. Each day you get 1 portion of broccoli with a skinless, boneless, plain grilled chicken breast with a glass of milk for eternity. But you get no condiments of any kind.

i wish i i knew if i should restart my save.

 

080612162020

Done. Your saved clone #467 is activated and ready for social replacement. Please, proceed to the incinerator #4 for the deduplication procedure.

What if paint a graffiti on the Odyssey 20xx monolith?

It won't work.

I wish a KSP dev would reply to this message.

The response can only be seen by kerbals. A shame as they lay out exactly when each update is coming for ksp as well as an exact launch day for ksp2, but again only kerbals can see it.

wish i could meet jeb, bill and bob kerman.

225512202020

Granted. Now they can say just in your face everything what they are thinking about you...

I wish Jool  had a polar hexagon, and the wrench was on Tylo.

Granted, but both only exist for one second when loading a new save.

I wish for more planets in KSP.

Granted. The Sun/Kerbol becomes a planet. But you can't land land safely because of its gravity.

How many Kerbals does it take to move Gilly?

Granted? You get nothing because that's a question not a wish 

I wish Kerbin to spin the other way.

Edited January 6, 2021 by Spaceman.Spiff

Granted. Kerbol is now spinning on your head. 

I wish I had a NASA Supercomputer

Granted. You get a NASA supercomputer from the 1960's.

I wish all planets and moons tasted like mint.

Granted, now it's starting to look a lot like -- I'm too late aren't I?

I wish for 1 trillion dollars to be given to SpaceX.

Granted, now Elon has control of all global markets because this money was given in equal shares of Google, Amazon, and Apple. Elon is successful in colonizing Mars, but becomes its dictator and then annexes the Moon. Seeking to expand his empire, he declares war on Earth. Every living being is annihilated by quantum nuclear weapons.

I wish for some coffee

Granted. BigMac gets costing 200k USD next year. The trillion is nothing.

Oops again. Ninja'd.  

1 minute ago, Spaceman.Spiff said:

I wish for some coffee

You get some coffee but no cup.

43 minutes ago, Spaceman.Spiff said:

You get nothing because that's a question not a wish 

Oops, wrong thread...

Though, I wish Kerbals to move the Gilly.

Edited January 6, 2021 by kerbiloid

The kerbals live on Gilly now, but Kerbals can never Eva again because all of the EVA Fuel has been used up trying to keep bob and bill from floating out into space. 
I wish for KSP2 to be released tomorrow, for free!

Granted.  It is super buggy and doesn't run on any machine.  The devs state it will take at least a year to patch sufficiently to be playable.

I wish I was one of the KSP2 devs.

2 hours ago, Popestar said:

Granted.  It is super buggy and doesn't run on any machine.  The devs state it will take at least a year to patch sufficiently to be playable.

 

I said KSP2 not Cyberpunk 2077!

 

Wish granted! You are part of the development of an awesome game, but it keeps getting delayed and you also chronically spill coffee on your laptop right before you save your code. Because of this, you "develop" coffee for the team instead of coding.

I wish I could see the SN9 launch

Granted. But it appears to you as if its moving at 10,000 times faster than normal.

I wish Bill Waterson would revive his Calvin and Hobbes comics.

190001062020
